trans-unit.source: Defines a decoder that requires delayed bitmap creation such as asynchronous image downloads.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个要求延迟位图创建的解码器，例如异步图像下载。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder> is used when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions.DelayCreation> is specified.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder>时使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions.DelayCreation>指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.Decoder%2A> property creates the necessary "real decoder" on an on-demand basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.Decoder%2A>属性在按需基础上创建所需"实际解码器"。

trans-unit.source: All decoder properties return `null` while content is downloading.
trans-unit.target: 所有解码器属性将都返回`null`在下载内容时。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder> can also be created when the system has an image that is being asynchronously downloaded locally.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder>时系统具有正在异步下载本地映像也可以创建。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the decoder also returns `null` for properties until the image has been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，解码器也会返回`null`属性之前已下载图像。

trans-unit.source: The application can check the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.IsDownloading%2A> property or add a delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.DownloadCompleted> event to monitor the download status.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以检查<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.IsDownloading%2A>属性或添加的委托<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.DownloadCompleted>事件来监视下载状态。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, any frames obtained from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder> while the image is downloading will return a width/height of 1,1 until the frames have finished downloading.
trans-unit.target: 此外，任何帧通过<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder>下载图像时才帧完成下载后，将返回 1，1 宽度/高度。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objects that are returned by this class are frozen and are therefore immutable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> 返回此类的对象已冻结并因此不可变。

trans-unit.source: Gets information that describes this codec.
trans-unit.target: 获取此编解码器的相关描述信息。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the late bound decoder is still downloading, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果仍在下载后期绑定解码器，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to read information from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo> object and send it to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何读取从信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo>对象，并将其发送到一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the color profile that is associated with a bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示与位图关联的颜色配置文件（如果已定义）。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> that represents the embedded color profile of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的实例，表示位图的嵌入式颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If no color profile has been defined, or if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> is still downloading content, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义颜色配置文件或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> 仍在下载内容，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying decoder that is associated with this late-bound decoder.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此后期绑定解码器关联的基础解码器。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" />.
trans-unit.target: 基础 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> is still downloading a bitmap, the underlying decoder is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> 仍在下载位图，则基础解码器为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the underlying decoder is created on first access.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将在首次访问时创建基础解码器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of an individual frame within a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取位图中单个镇的内容。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder> is downloaded asynchronously, it is possible for the underlying collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.Frames%2A> to change after content is downloaded and decoded.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder>是异步下载的则可能找不到基础的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder.Frames%2A>更改后将下载内容并将其解码。

trans-unit.source: While content is downloading, the collection always returns at least one item.
trans-unit.target: 当下载内容时，集合始终会返回至少一个项。

trans-unit.source: When downloading and decoding are complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> automatically changes its underlying content.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，下载和解码时<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>会自动更改其基础的内容。

trans-unit.source: In other words, only the collection object can change; the actual frame object remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，只有集合对象可以更改;实际框架对象保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Any frame obtained from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder> while the image is downloading will return a width/height of `1,1` until the frames have finished downloading.
trans-unit.target: 从获取任何帧<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder>下载映像时将返回的宽度/高度`1,1`直到帧下载完毕。

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] images support more than one frame.
trans-unit.target: 仅[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]映像支持多个帧。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objects that this property returns are frozen.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>此属性返回的对象均被冻结。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> as a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>作为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the decoder is currently downloading content.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示解码器当前是否正在下载内容的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the decoder is downloading content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果解码器正在下载内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette" /> that is associated with this decoder.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此解码器关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette" /> that is associated with this decoder.
trans-unit.target: 与此解码器关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette" />。

trans-unit.source: If the bitmap has no palette, or if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> is still downloading content, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位图有没有调色板，或如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" />仍在下载内容，则此属性返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents the global preview of this bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，用于表示此位图的全局预览（如果已定义）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents the global preview of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />用于表示位图的全局预览。

trans-unit.source: If no preview is defined, or if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> is still downloading content, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义预览或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> 仍在下载内容，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that this property returns is frozen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>冻结此属性返回。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents the thumbnail of the bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，用于表示位图的缩略图（如果已定义）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />表示位图的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: If no thumbnail is defined, or if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" /> is still downloading content, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不定义任何缩略图，或如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.LateBoundBitmapDecoder" />仍在下载内容，则此属性返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that this property returns is frozen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>冻结此属性返回。
